Different Crime.Crime Name: Serious non-political crime under Article 1F(b) of the United Nations Convention relating to the Status of Refugees
application_details: Cuero was convicted of cocaine trafficking
conclusion_outcome: The application for judicial review was dismissed
cause_of_action: Cuero's refugee claim was denied due to his prior conviction for cocaine trafficking
procedure_followed: Cuero sought judicial review, arguing rehabilitation should be considered. The Federal Court reviewed the Board's decision
result_of_case: The court dismissed the application, upholding the Board's decision and certifying the question for further consideration
